dmca.title: Business Claims Store Copied Verbatim Product Description
dmca.body:
March 23, 2005

Copyright & Intellectual Property Agent for Notice 
Google
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints
Via Fax [Private] 

Another store (www.aphome.com) has copied an item description of ours verbatim and has not responded to email requests to remove the infringement.

The item was copied from us, without question. I have more than a good faith belief that the disputed use is not authorized by the copyright or intellectual property holder owner (us), its agent or the law.

I swear that the above information is correct, under penalty of perjury, and that I am authorized to act on the copyright on the owner's behalf. The owner is Synergy Computing Business Group, Inc., I am the president and sole officer.

Please rectify the situation immediately by having them remove the item. Please notify me when it has been resolved. The infringing items follow:

http://www.aphome.com/productinfo.php?products_id=970

The search query that I used is (without quotes) "Viking Food Processor"
http://www. google.com/search?sourceid=navclient&ie=UTF-8&rls=GGLD,GGLD:2004-37,GGLD:en&q=viking+food+processor


Sincerely,

[Private] 
[Private]
Synergy Computing Business Group, Inc. DBA Chefs Resource.com
[Private]
Laguna Hills CA 92653
[Private] [Private]
